verse: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.
And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive [to Allah].
O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Righteousness is not turning your faces toward the east or the west, but [true] righteousness is in one who believes in Allah...
O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned and from that which We have produced for you from the earth.
And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided.
Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans, the needy...
O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm for Allah, witnesses in justice...
Come, I will recite what your Lord has prohibited to you. [He commands] that you not associate anything with Him...
Take what is given freely, enjoin what is good, and turn away from the ignorant.
Zakah expenditures are only for the poor and for the needy and for those employed to collect [zakah]...
O mankind, there has come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers.
Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality, bad conduct, and oppression.
Your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.
Say, I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God.
Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
O mankind, We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.
Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes...
Say, He is Allah, [who is] One.
Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak.
Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.
